# User-Input Parameters

```{r}
num_strata=NSTRATA
power=POWER
alpha=ALPHA
theta=THETA
delta_pi=DELTA_PI
delta_nu=DELTA_NU
phi=PHI
sigma2=SIGMA2
xi=XI
```

# Sample Size Visualization

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(preference)
library(ggplot2)
path_to_df=PATH_TO_DF
df = read.csv(path_to_df)
params = list(power=power, alpha=alpha, theta=theta, delta_pi=delta_pi,
              delta_nu=delta_nu, phi=phi, sigma2=sigma2,
              xi=xi, num_strata=num_strata)
df = preference:::create_strat_selection_df(params)
preference:::create_strat_selection_plot(params, df)
```
